lines.text: You eat one lousy foot and they call you a cannibal. What a world!
Look out! He's got a broken milk carton!
Dan's a good man, and he's never eaten a whole person in his entire life.
Now I know it looked like I fell... but it was all part of my plan.
Look, Bendix made a stew. I had no idea there was a foot in it.
I'd eaten everything else! I ate the seat cushions like they told us to in training!
The aerodynamics work! He's breaking wind at 90!
Quick, how many decisions have I made today?
Looks like he got kicked in the nuts!
Please sign this, absolving me of any responsibility for the results of treatment.
And I intend to remain one.
Raise the flags of all nations!
